title: 24 hour countdown timers
body:
When the error comes up in the League of Legends store "Please try again in 24 hours" Riot should have a countdown timer to when you make another purchase of Riot Points, because this will be the third day this error has come up for me, and it will be well past 24 hours when I attempt to purchase more points.

Does anyone know how to rectify this issue?

Does it happen to anyone else?

Can Riot make a countdown timer for that? I believe it would be so helpful.

replies.body:
This has not happened to me before. I didn't even know it had a cooldown if it failed.

[Make a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and see if they can fix it for your account.
